Capture Camera¶

This script captures the camera pictures and saves it in folder. We will use it especially for the training phase. To make the module callable we use the very handy fastscript library.

create_logger[source]

create_logger(log_file=None)

Initialize global logger and return it.

:param log_file: log to this file, or to standard output if None :return: created logger

create_folder[source]

create_folder(path:Path, foldername)

creates a folder if it does not exist already

capture[source]

capture(path_save_files:"Path to where the pics will be stored."='/mnt/Data/to_label', time_start:"time when recording starts"='8:00', time_stop:"time when recording stops"='17:00', file_log:"Path to where the log files will be stored"='/mnt/Data/capture_log', path_env_file:"Path where we can find the .env file"='..', sleep_time:"seconds to sleep between captures"=0.25)

now = datetime.now()
now

datetime.datetime(2020, 3, 16, 5, 51, 21, 33726)
from nbdev.export import *
notebook2script('02_capture_camera.ipynb')
